description.text: How does use-to-earn reward you if you keep your TiUSD balance in your wallet?
In principle, the more TiUSD and longer time you hold, the more rewards you will earn.

The use-to-earn module will scan per second your TiUSD balance and calculate how many rewards you'll earn in the same way as a staking pool does. Remember, TiTi Use-to-earn farming rewards will be distributed to users in a 7-DAY-Cycle consecutively. Meanwhile, you are able to claim use-to-earn rewards of the last Cycle (7 days) anytime after the Cycle finishes. The unclaimed TiTi Rewards for past Cycles will be automatically accumulated to your address.
Keep in mind that you can claim the rewards in Epoch-1 starting from UTC 08:00 a.m. Mar 23th.
